author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Fix a bug for wrong DetID assignment in HCAL - relevenat for Runs 1,2,3,4

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for

Need to be back ported to all earlier CMSSW versions
title: Run3-hcx337 Fix a bug for wrong DetID assignment in HCAL - relevenat for Runs 1,2,3,4
